idea:
We take this opportunity to introduce ourselves as M/s. TPS PETROLEUMS LLP which is a recently established venture by a group of experienced peoples with a clear intention of providing services of   door step diesel delivery to various stationary, earth moving and mining equipment i.e. DG sets, excavators, stone quarries etc. with utmost quality, quantity and of course timely delivery, where bear minimum costing shall be given the prime preference and the services  shall be ably backed up with a quick & efficient service team.

Since our startup involving services of the fuel delivery to various prospective clients mentioned above, it will really help us to generate employment as well as wealth.

1) Chassis Requirement:  Initially we will be requiring a commercial truck chassis from any reputed manufacturer in India i.e. Tata Motors, Ashok Leyland, Eicher, Mahindra and Mahindra or Bharat Benz, thereby the more we purchase the chassis more the business will be generated to the above chassis manufacturers and also related supplementary small scale industries will be getting more jobs through these manufacturers.

2) Bowser Body Manufacturing: Building a Diesel Bowser body as per the set standards of Dept of PESO, from approved body builders, thus various such vehicle body builders will be getting the job work and the related supplementary small scale industries.

3) The Team Working on the Diesel Bowser : Each Vehicle in each shift will require team of 2 to 3 persons for delivering fuel at various locations, thereby the more no. of vehicles will get added into the fleet, the more people will get the jobs in this service industry.

4) Oil Companies: Since our services are related to the Oil industries and our efforts are to mobilize and sophisticate the existing fuel supplies to the various earth moving equipment, agriculture equipment, DG sets, Stone quarries, Mining at remote locations. This will surely increase the volume sale of the oil companies, thereby increasing movement of logistic companies too.
name: TPS PETROLEUMS LLP

idea:
Tiguan Security And Allied Services Pvt. Ltd. is powered by our people. A team unlike any other within the security & facility industry. We embrace change, challenge and client expectations. We continuously implement new strategies and strive for an environment which creates a culture of constant improvement.

Tiguan Security And Allied Services Pvt. Ltd. has provided security and other Allied services to clients in Maharashtra, Gujrat & Goa. We have acquired PSARA license which is mandatory for a private security agency and also registered in various government schemes such as EPF, ESI, PT, ST, etc.

Tiguan Security And Allied Services Pvt. Ltd. has a policy, which provides our clients response to any service request in less than three hours.

Tiguan Security And Allied Services Pvt. Ltd. Our integrity as a service provider helps ensure we honor all our commitments to the Clients which have given us the honor to provide service to them. Tiguan Security And Allied Services Pvt. Ltd. operated has the experience, dedication, organization, intellectual capital and fiscal strength to offer a complete service.
name: TIGUAN SECURITY AND ALLIED SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The company is a new start-up based in Mumbai city, started by few technocrats who are alumnus of IIT Bombay and working in the field of Industrial and Power Electronics since long time.

The major area of business is to provide solutions to the important technical issues in the field of Power Engineering and Industrial Automation through consultation and customized product developments.

It also functions as an innovator by converting new ideas into products with thorough research on some cutting edge technologies to foster indigenization and import substitution.
name: INVENTRONICS PRIVATE LIMITED
